channel.title: Making Certain Shops, take Cwars tickets (317)
channel.description: I have rares on my server, and thier all in one cerain shop. I made a shop, to where you can buy the cwars tickets 2m each, but now i need to make the shop with all the rares in it, cost tickets instead of coins, can someone please explain to me how to do this. Btw, its been a few months since ive coded so i might be confused =) thanks for looking at this.

item.title: Making Certain Shops, take Cwars tickets (317)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

model something after your tzar shop that sells the ring things(the ranged weapon) because it uses those black things instead of coins.

Read full topic
item.source: Making Certain Shops, take Cwars tickets (317)
